input: walking around a pool in 100 degree weather carrying cold drinks for unmasked people and they have to be all masked up and well you see it everywhere here. Texas just Texas just really didn't shut down much for the virus so seeing other places that had it really a lot harder it's uh it's just it's different it's different.
offline_reference: 在一百度的高温下四处走动，为那些没戴口罩的人递送冷饮，而他们却必须全都戴上口罩，这种场景在这里随处可见，德克萨斯州对疫情几乎未采取什么封锁措施，因此看到其他地方经历更严峻的情况，真是大不一样，确实很不同。
